events.message: I am filing a claim due to a recent car accident where my vehicle collided with another on the highway.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident after review of the initial report and accident details.
An insurance agent has been assigned to manage and follow up on your vehicle collision claim.
We have received and acknowledged your auto accident claim and will begin processing shortly.
Please provide the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and a repair estimate for claim processing.
All requested documents, including the police report and vehicle damage photos, have been submitted successfully.
The claim investigation has commenced to verify accident details and assess the damage to the vehicle.
The investigation has been completed with a full assessment of liability and damage to your car.
A proposed settlement amount has been communicated to help cover repairs for the vehicle collision damages.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the claim handling process and appreciated the timely updates and clear communication.
Your auto accident claim has been officially approved, confirming coverage and the agreed compensation amount.
The payment to cover your vehicle repair costs following the accident claim has been issued today.
Your auto accident claim is now closed after successful settlement and payment completion.
